name: Where it Pays to Attend College
data_intro: Salaries by college, region, and academic major

cat_feature_intro.Undergraduate Major: The academic major of the students.
cat_feature_intro.School Name: The name of the college or university.
cat_feature_intro.School Type: The type of school (public or private).
cat_feature_intro.Region: The geographical region where the school is located.

num_feature_intro.Percent change from Starting to Mid-Care: The percentage change in salary from starting salary to mid-career salary.
num_feature_intro.Starting Median Salary: The median starting salary for graduates of the school in a given major.
num_feature_intro.Mid-Career Median Salary: The median salary for graduates of the school in a given major after some years of work.
